titles.title: To provide funds for the planning of a special census of Americans residing abroad.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Census.

bill.summary: 5/25/2000--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that the Bureau of the Census should: (1) carry out a special census of all Americans residing abroad in 2003; (2) review the means by which such Americans may be included in the 2010 decennial census; and (3) provide for the inclusion of such Americans in such census and decennial censuses thereafter. Authorizes appropriations.
